Configuring vHBA Templates

To configure vHBA templates, perform the following:

 1. Select the Organization from the drop-down list. By default, root is displayed.

 2. Enter the Number of vHBAs in the text box and click Add to generate Virtual Host Bus Adapter.

Select the QoS Policy for your vHBA. See Configuring Quality of Service Policy

Figure 6-6 Configuring vHBA Template

Note You can edit the fields generated HBAs. You can select the template type to either Initial or Updating Template. Initial template is a service profiles created from an initial template that inherit all the properties of the template. However, after you create the profile, it is no longer connected to the template. If you need to make changes to one or more profiles created from this template, you must change each profile individually. Updating template is service profiles created from an updating template that inherit all the properties of the template and remain connected to the template. Any changes to the template automatically update the service profiles created from the template.

 3. Click Save and next to proceed further.
